description: Non material amendment to planning permission 17/5319/S73 dated 07/02/18 for `Variation of conditions 2 (Plans Numbers) pursuant to planning permission H/02051/14 dated 16/10/2014 for `Demolition of existing building and erection of new two storey primary school with associated parking and landscaping.` Amendments include amendments to the window arrangements, wall finish, curved wall to first floor rear elevation.' Amendments include introduction of phased approach to development. Phase 1 to omit the first floor apart from the plant room with reduction in size and internal alterations to ground floor to  create larger areas for nursery/classrooms and omit staircases and lifts. Phase 2 to complete the first floor and internal alterations to the ground floor to introduce staircases and lifts as per the approved plans.   Adjustments to north and west elevation windows design, new windows and external door introduced as a result of internal alterations, changes to external terrace, deck timber composite replaced by non-slip concrete finish and soft rubber tiles (amended description).
